channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Polls
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-Polls

item.title: CVE-2022-1581|2024-08-03T00:10:03.682Z -- unknown -- wp-polls
item.description: The WP-Polls WordPress plugin before 2.76.0 prioritizes getting a visitor's IP from certain HTTP headers over PHP's REMOTE_ADDR, which makes it possible to bypass IP-based limitations to vote in certain situations.
